lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola witnessed the end to his perfect record with  Manchester City as his Premier League leaders had to come from behind three times to earn a 3-3 draw at Celtic in a dazzling Champions League Group C encounter on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola's Perfect Record Falls in Thrilling Celtic Draw
headline.main: Guardiola's Perfect Record Falls in Thrilling Celtic Draw
